DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect Dry Needling Spinal Mobility Trigger Points Patients Fibromyalgia Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dry Needling Spinal Mobility Trigger Points Patients With Fibromyalgia Syndrome .
DOC.detailed_description: Dry Needling skilled intervention us thin filiform needle penetrate skin stimulate underlie myofascial trigger point , muscular , connective tissue management neuromusculoskeletal pain movement impairment . Dry needling ( DN ) technique use treat dysfunction skeletal muscle , fascia , connective tissue , , diminish persistent peripheral nociceptive input , reduce restore impairment body structure function lead improved activity participation .
DOC.criteria: Fibromyalgia syndrome diagnosis . Aged 18 65 year . No regular physical activity . Limitation usual activity due pain least 1 day previous 30 day . Agreement attend evening therapy session . Severe physical disability . Comorbid condition ( eg , morbid obesity , inflammatory disease , irritable bowel syndrome , interstitial cystitis ) . Uncontrolled endocrine disorder ( eg , hyperthyroidism hypothyroidism , diabetes ) . Malignancy . Psychiatric . Illnesses ( eg , schizophrenia substance abuse ) . Medication usage asneeded analgesic ( exclude longterm narcotic ) . History surgery . History whiplash injury . Presence score > 9 point Beck Depression Inventory .
